buoy.title: Buoy App
buoy.description: An app for dropping anonymous notes around the world.

openly-secular.title: Openly Secular Campaign
openly-secular.description: An awareness campaign focused on removing the negative stigmas associated with being an athiest.

campaign-builder.title: Campaign Builder
campaign-builder.description: A community-organizing platform built for empowering small companies and candidates to easily launch online campaign websites.

opengov.title: OpenGov City Finder
opengov.description: An interactive widget to search for and locate customers of the OpenGov platform.

starcraft-wcs.title: StarCraft II WCS Player
starcraft-wcs.description: An interactive video player and scoreboard interface for the StarCraft II World Championship Series.

google-xy.title: Google X/Y: Dashboard
google-xy.description: A speculative design project exploring Google's place in the Internet of Things, based around ideas from Bruce Sterling's book, Shaping Things.

planeshift.title: PlaneShift Interface
planeshift.description: A conceptual user interface and matching website redesign for the open source MMORPG, Planeshift

ghostwire.title: Ghostwire: News Theme
ghostwire.description: A responsive news theme for the open source publishing platform, Ghost.

inkfish.title: Inkfish Themes
inkfish.description: A collection of responsive portfolio themes built with Stacey, an open source flat-file cms.

camidesign.title: camiDESIGN
camidesign.description: Web and graphic design for an architecture and interior design firm.

digital-wind-chime.title: Digital Wind Chime
digital-wind-chime.description: A "digital wind" chime. I wanted to create an “appliance-like” device that would feel at home on a desk in the same way that a nice clock might.

seizure-monitor.title: Wearable Seizure Monitor
seizure-monitor.description: A discrete, wearable device to detect seizures and call out for help at a time when the wearer could not.

public-sphere.title: Global Public Sphere
public-sphere.description: My senior project researching the relationship between social media and politics through the events of the Arab Spring.
